Bellevue.Darigold: Darigold, Inc., is an American dairy agricultural marketing cooperative. Headquartered in Seattle, Washington, it is owned by the more than 500 dairy farm members of the Northwest Dairy Association (formerly the Northwest Dairymen's Association) located in Washington, Oregon, Idaho, Northern California, and Montana. The cooperative was founded in 1917 as the United Dairymen's Association, and it bought the Consolidated Dairy Products Company in 1930.
